message:
SYSTEM: PURE.pdf: Página 13
●A user query Q is a conjunctive query in terms of 
vocabulary concepts.
●Q is insecure if there is at least one insecure rewriting 
Q’ of Q with respect to secrecies S. 
      e.g. Q(N,B,Z,G,R):-patient(N,B,Z,G),has(N,Y),disease(Y,'PAC'), 
     is_characterized_by(Y,Z),five_year_rate(Z,R).
PURE: Queries
13
speaker: SYSTEM
